Package org.neo4j.cypher.internal.collection

Class MemoryTrackingHeap<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api.DefaultCloseListenable
      • org.neo4j.cypher.internal.collection.MemoryTrackingHeap<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, AutoCloseablePlus
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultComparatorSortTable, DefaultComparatorTopTable
    abstract class MemoryTrackingHeap<T>
extends DefaultCloseListenable
implements AutoCloseablePlus
    A partial implementation (only supports what is necessary for our use cases) of a memory tracking heap data structure (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heap_(data_structure)) By default this is a max-heap. Use a reverse comparator to get a min-heap.

      • getAutoClosingIterator

        protected Iterator<T> getAutoClosingIterator​(AutoCloseable closeable)
        Create an iterator that will automatically call close() when it is exhausted. To be used by sub-classes implementing autoClosingIterator(). The caller can also provide an optional closeable of its own that will also be closed.

      • heapify

        protected void heapify()
        Make a heap out of the backing array. O(n)

      • siftDown

        protected void siftDown​(int k,
                        T x,
                        int n)
        Sift down an element in the heap. O(log(n))
        Parameters:
        k - index to sift down from
        x - element to sift down
        n - the size of the heap
